trans-unit.source: sets the @error flag to non-zero (GDI_ERROR).

trans-unit.source: If the driver cannot support the JPEG or PNG file image passed to SetDIBitsToDevice,

target.mrk: If the driver cannot support the JPEG or PNG file image passed to SetDIBitsToDevice,

trans-unit.source: the function will fail and return GDI_ERROR.
